name: animate-display-property
description: A JavaScript micro plugin to add transition effects for the CSS display property. This plugin uses CSS3 animations to acheive transition effects when an element's display property changes.

scripts.build: npm run lint && gulp copy && gulp concat-css && gulp minify
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
